actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 314(d) of the Public Health Service Act to extend for three fiscal years the program of assistance for comprehensive public health services.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to extend the program of assistance for comprehensive public health services through fiscal year 1984. Revises the formula for such grant amounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 314(d) of the Public Health Service Act to extend for three fiscal years the program of assistance for comprehensive public health services.
